name: Quick-n'-Easy Chicken Cheese Steak
author: taggerung86
summary: A nice, hot cheesy sandwich ready in less than 5 minutes.
directions: Cook chicken and hot sauce together in a non-stick skillet over medium heat, stirring to coat chicken evenly with hot sauce, until evenly heated, about 3 minutes
Scrape chicken into center of the pan to form a shape similar to the hot dog bun
Cut Cheddar cheese slice in half and place on top of chicken; cook until Cheddar cheese is melted, 1 to 2 minutes
Place bottom half of hot dog bun over chicken and cheese mixture, slide a spatula underneath, and invert onto a plate
Place top half of hot dog bun over Cheddar cheese
